statements: UPDATE genomic_data SET species_name = 'Homo sapiens' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE genomic_data SET gene_name = 'BRCA1' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE genomic_data SET start_position = 2000, end_position = 3000 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE genomic_data SET species_name='Homo sapiens', gene_name='BRCA1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE genomic_data SET sequence='ATGGCCTTAGCAACGGCGCCCTTGGC' WHERE gene_name='TP53';
UPDATE genomic_data SET start_position=500, end_position=1000 WHERE chromosome='chrX';
UPDATE GenomicData SET GenomeSize = GenomeSize + 100 WHERE Id = 1;
UPDATE ComparativeGenomics SET NumSharedGenes = NumSharedGenes - 10 WHERE ComparisonId = 2;
UPDATE GenomicData SET SequencingDepth = 25.5 WHERE OrganismName = 'Human';
UPDATE GenomicData SET GenomeSize = 500000, SequencingDepth = 30.5 WHERE Id = 1;
UPDATE ComparativeGenomics SET NumSharedGenes = 1500, EvolutionaryDistance = 0.1 WHERE ComparisonId = 3;
UPDATE GenomicData SET OrganismName = 'Updated Organism' WHERE Id = 2;
UPDATE species SET genome_size = 4.5 WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE genes SET gene_location = 'Chromosome 2' WHERE gene_id = 3;
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_effect = 'Harmful' WHERE mutation_id = 5;
UPDATE species SET genome_size = 3.2 WHERE species_id = 1;
UPDATE genes SET gene_sequence = 'ATCGGCGTAA' WHERE gene_id = 100;
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_effect = 'Protein Change' WHERE mutation_id = 500;

UPDATE Genes SET gene_name = 'GeneA' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE Chromosomes SET chromosome_name = 'ChromosomeX' WHERE chromosome_id = 1;

UPDATE Genes SET sequence = 'AGCTAGCTAGCT' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE Chromosomes SET chromosome_name = 'Chromosome X' WHERE chromosome_id = 2;

UPDATE Genes SET chromosome = 'chrX' WHERE gene_id = 3;
UPDATE Mutations SET mutation_type = 'Substitution' WHERE mutation_id = 5;
UPDATE Species SET genome_size = genome_size + 100 WHERE species_id = 1;
